import React from 'react' import {useState,useEffect} from "react" import "../CSS/Pages/FittingSizeSuggestion.css"; export default function FittingSizeSuggestion() { const [CustomerSizeInputs,setCustomerSizeInputs]=useState({ "WaistAound":"", "ChestAround":"", "ArmLength":"", "Weight":"" }); function HandleSizSuggestion(e) { setCustomerSizeInputs({...CustomerSizeInputs,[e.target.name]:String(e.target.value)}); console.log(CustomerSizeInputs); } return ( <>

Waist Around:

cm

Arm length :

cm

Chest Around:

cm

Weight :

Kg
...
{/* */}

Your Best Fitting Size

Body Measurements
Waist Around :
{CustomerSizeInputs.WaistAround}cm
Arm Length :
{CustomerSizeInputs.ArmLength}cm
Chest Around :
{CustomerSizeInputs.ChestAround}cm
Weight :
{CustomerSizeInputs.Weight}kg
) }
